title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.12 - Members of the Departmental Advisory Committee as volunteers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.12 - Members of the Departmental Advisory Committee as volunteers

State Regulations

The members of the Departmental

Advisory Committee, as volunteers are expressly authorized to participate in a

State-sponsored volunteer program within the meaning of Public Officers Law, section 17(a). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
611.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
